main event: A UFO sighting involving a round, flat object described as being silver and appearing like a toy balloon over Manitou Springs, Colorado.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10 seconds,Two confirmed witnesses: a housewife and her 13-year-old sister,The object drifted from east to west below the clouds,Initial reports indicated the object was unidentified, but later analysis revealed they were likely toy balloons sold during the local rodeo season.
sighted object: round, flat object resembling a silver dollar or toy balloon
